title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedding providers for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous/asynchronous APIs and model management utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem that exposes Ollama REST endpoints for chat, completion, embeddings, and model operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, managing history, and switching models on the fly.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code completion and Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU node support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance via the ollama-js npm package.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform CDK) construct to provision Ollama server on AWS EC2 with GPU support in TypeScript/Python.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and LangChain for Q&A over documents.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks pairing Ollama with Open-WebUI, Flowise, n8n, and other low-code tools.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node that wraps Ollama chat and embedding endpoints for no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async client for Ollama with serde serialization and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that lets server members chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that integrates Ollama models into Slack channels with threading and context memory.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API exposing Ollama chat, completion, and embeddings endpoints with Swagger docs.
